comment: This class was super interesting and I did not struggle with the weekly quizzes. Everything was very clear in their instructions and the tests lined up well with the quizzes. This was definitely a class you needed to study for, but not super hard. The professor also was super good at communication.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Idk what these horrible reviews are about but for me this was a 10/10 easy class. The work was actually really interesting coming to the end and she isn't a harsh grader. Quizzes are easy just read the powerpoints and chapters. I took this online.

Professor changed the syllabus twice at the start of the semester, creating challenges for those like myself who input assignments into a planner. Missed a discussion post and was basically told it was not her problem. Unclear in the syllabus but she drops a ton of grades at the very end. Possibly because majori

The content is not intense, the professor sets up assignment where they are not visible on calender so you should actively search for them daily or stay very up to date with the syllabus. She will have absolute refusal to help under any and all circumstances. If you don't miss any assignments and never ask her for help passing with a B+ is easy.
